tr.td: KSQL是X5中面向概念数据的结构化查询语言，KSQL采用类SQL-92语法，支持SELECT、INSERT、UPDATE、DELETE的基本语法。
由于KSQL操作的是“概念”，而“概念”与“物理表”是隔离的，因此KSQL具有跨数据库平台的存取能力，KSQL中提供的操作符和函数都是跨数据库平台的。
下面列出KSQL与SQL（MySQL）的对照语句，点击语句可以在弹出的测试对话框中测试执行。

td.style: height: 19px; text-align: center; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); background-color: rgb(84, 179, 243);

tr.td: KSQL

td.style: text-align: center; height: 19px; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); background-color: rgb(108, 192, 63);

tr.td: SQL（此列案例的SQL语法基于MySQL数据库）
区别
KSQL中概念名、关系名、别名、变量名及表达式函数名大小写敏感
SQL中全部大小写不敏感
KSQL中概念必须定义别名，可以与概念同名
SQL中可以不定义表的别名

td.style: height: 19px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;

tr.td: KSQL中用概念的别名作为主键字段名

td.style: height: 19px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;

tr.td: SQL中使用主键的字段名
查询

td.style: height: 19px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;
td.label: SELECT c, c.fCompanyName, c.fRegion, c.fCity, c.fPhone \nFROM DEMO_Customers c

td.style: height: 19px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;
td.label: SELECT fCustomerID, fCompanyName, fRegion, fCity, fPhone \nFROM DEMO_Customers

tr.td: 子查询

td.style: height: 19px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;
td.label:
SELECT o, o.fOrderNumber, 
	(
		SELECT SUM(d.fUnitPrice * d.fQuantity * (1 - d.fDiscount)) 
		FROM DEMO_OrderDetails d 
		WHERE d.fOrderID = o
	) AS fTotalMoney 
FROM DEMO_Orders o

td.style: height: 19px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;
td.label:
SELECT o.fOrderID, o.fOrderNumber, 
	(
		SELECT SUM(d.fUnitPrice * d.fQuantity * (1 - d.fDiscount)) 
		FROM DEMO_OrderDetails d 
		WHERE d.fOrderID = o.fOrderID
	) AS fTotalMoney 
FROM DEMO_Orders o

tr.td: 更新

td.style: height: 19px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;
td.label: UPDATE DEMO_Customers c \nSET c.fPhone = '59798677' \nWHERE c.fCompanyName = '椅天文化事业'

td.style: height: 19px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;
td.label: UPDATE DEMO_Customers \nSET fPhone = '59798677' \nWHERE fCompanyName = '椅天文化事业'

tr.td: 插入

td.label: INSERT INTO DEMO_Customers c (c, c.version, c.fCompanyName) \nVALUES (GUID(), 0, '北京起步科技有限公司')
INSERT INTO DEMO_Customers (fCustomerID, version, fCompanyName) \nVALUES (UPPER(REPLACE(UUID(), '-', '')), 0, '北京起步科技有限公司')

td.style: height: 19px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255); border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;

tr.td: KSQL中的GUID函数是跨数据库的

td.style: height: 19px; color: rgb(0, 128, 0); border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;

tr.td: 不同类型的数据库生成GUID的函数是不同的
删除

td.style: height: 19px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;
td.label: DELETE FROM DEMO_Customers c \nWHERE c.fCompanyName = '北京起步科技有限公司'

td.style: height: 19px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;
td.label: DELETE FROM DEMO_Customers \nWHERE fCompanyName = '北京起步科技有限公司'

tr.td: 分组

td.label: SELECT c.fRegion, COUNTALL() AS regionCount \nFROM DEMO_Customers c \nGROUP BY c.fRegion
SELECT fRegion, COUNT(*) AS regionCount \nFROM DEMO_Customers \nGROUP BY fRegion

td.style: height: 19px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255); border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;

tr.td: KSQL中用COUNTALL()代替COUNT(*)

td.style: height: 19px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;

tr.td: 排序

td.style: height: 19px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;
td.label: SELECT c, c.fCompanyName, c.fRegion, c.fCity, c.fPhone \nFROM DEMO_Customers c \nORDER BY c.fRegion asc, c.fCity asc

td.style: height: 19px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;
td.label: SELECT fCustomerID, fCompanyName, fRegion, fCity, fPhone \nFROM DEMO_Customers \nORDER BY fRegion asc, fCity asc

tr.td: 唯一

td.style: height: 19px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;
td.label: SELECT DISTINCT c.fRegion, c.fCity \nFROM DEMO_Customers c

td.style: height: 19px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;
td.label: SELECT DISTINCT fRegion, fCity \nFROM DEMO_Customers

tr.td: 左连接

td.style: height: 19px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;
td.label:
SELECT c, c.fCompanyName, COUNT(o) AS fOrderCount 
FROM DEMO_Customers c 
	OPTIONAL JOIN DEMO_Orders o ON o.fCustomerID = c 
GROUP BY 
	c, c.fCompanyName 
ORDER BY 
	fOrderCount

td.style: height: 19px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;
td.label:
SELECT c.fCustomerID, c.fCompanyName, COUNT(o.fOrderID) AS fOrderCount 
FROM DEMO_Customers c 
	LEFT JOIN DEMO_Orders o ON o.fCustomerID = c.fCustomerID 
GROUP BY 
	c.fCustomerID, c.fCompanyName 
ORDER BY 
	fOrderCount

tr.td: 分页

td.label: SELECT c, c.fCompanyName, c.fRegion, c.fCity, c.fPhone \nFROM DEMO_Customers c \nLIMIT 20, 10
SELECT fCustomerID, fCompanyName, fRegion, fCity, fPhone \nFROM DEMO_Customers \nLIMIT 20, 10

td.style: height: 19px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255); border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;

tr.td: KSQL中的分页是跨数据库的，“LIMIT 20, 10”表示从第21行开始取10行

td.style: height: 19px; color: rgb(0, 128, 0); border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;

tr.td: 不同类型的数据库对分页的支持是不同的
KSQL支持的操作符（KSQL提供的所有操作符都是跨数据库平台的）
2． 比较: =, >, <, >=, <=, <>, like, in, exists, is null, is not null, between
3． 逻辑: and, or, not
4． 其他: union, case ... when ... then ... else ... end

td.style: text-align: center; height: 19px; font-weight: bold; background-color: rgb(84, 179, 243); color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

tr.td: KSQL

td.style: text-align: center; height: 19px; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); background-color: rgb(108, 192, 63);

tr.td: SQL（MySQL）
不等于

td.label: SELECT c.* \nFROM DEMO_Customers c \nWHERE c.fRegion <> '东北'
SELECT c.* \nFROM DEMO_Customers c \nWHERE c.fRegion != '东北'

td.style: height: 19px; color: rgb(84, 179, 243); border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;

tr.td: KSQL中“不等于”只支持“<>”

td.style: height: 19px; color: rgb(108, 192, 63); border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;

tr.td: SQL中“不等于”可以用“<>”或者“!=”
NOT IN

td.label:
SELECT c.* 
FROM DEMO_Customers c 
WHERE NOT (
	c IN (
		SELECT o.fCustomerID 
		FROM DEMO_Orders o
	)
)

SELECT c.* 
FROM DEMO_Customers c 
WHERE c.fCustomerID NOT IN (
	SELECT o.fCustomerID 
	FROM DEMO_Orders o
)

td.style: height: 19px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255); border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;

tr.td: KSQL中“NOT IN”的用法是在“IN”的外层加“NOT”

td.style: height: 19px; color: rgb(0, 128, 0); border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;

tr.td: SQL中支持“NOT IN”连写的用法
EXISTS

td.style: height: 19px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(128, 128, 128); border-bottom-style: solid;
td.label:
SELECT c.* 
FROM DEMO_Customers c 
WHERE EXISTS (
	SELECT o.fCustomerID 
	FROM DEMO_Orders o 
	WHERE c = o.fCustomerID
)

td.style: height: 19px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(128, 128, 128); border-bottom-style: solid;
td.label:
SELECT c.* 
FROM DEMO_Customers c 
WHERE EXISTS (
	SELECT o.fCustomerID 
	FROM DEMO_Orders o 
	WHERE c.fCustomerID = o.fCustomerID
)

tr.td: UNION

td.style: height: 19px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(128, 128, 128); border-bottom-style: solid;
td.label:
SELECT c AS fID, c.fCompanyName, '客户' as fType 
FROM DEMO_Customers c 
UNION
SELECT s, s.fCompanyName, '供应商' 
FROM DEMO_Suppliers s

td.style: height: 19px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(128, 128, 128); border-bottom-style: solid;
td.label:
SELECT c.fCustomerID AS fID, c.fCompanyName, '客户' as fType 
FROM DEMO_Customers c 
UNION
SELECT s.fSupplierID, s.fCompanyName, '供应商' 
FROM DEMO_Suppliers s

tr.td: CASE

td.style: height: 19px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;
td.label:
SELECT DISTINCT o.fStatus, 
	(CASE 
		WHEN o.fStatus = 'shipped' THEN '已发货' 
		WHEN o.fStatus = 'checking' THEN '审批中' 
		WHEN o.fStatus = 'checked' THEN '已审批' 
		ELSE '' 
	END) AS fStatusText 
FROM DEMO_Orders o

td.style: height: 19px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;
td.label:
SELECT DISTINCT o.fStatus, 
	(CASE 
		WHEN o.fStatus = 'shipped' THEN '已发货' 
		WHEN o.fStatus = 'checking' THEN '审批中' 
		WHEN o.fStatus = 'checked' THEN '已审批' 
		ELSE '' 
	END) AS fStatusText 
FROM DEMO_Orders o

tr.td: KSQL支持的函数（KSQL提供的函数都是跨数据库平台的）
1. 字符串: concat, instr, substring, ltrim, rtrim, trim, length, upper, lower, replace
2. 数值: mod, ceil, pi, rand, square, ln, log10, abs, sin, cos, tan, cot, asin, atan, exp, floor, sqrt, sign, power, round
3. 集合: count, max, min, sum, avg, countAll
4. 时间日期: dateTimeToDate, dateTimeToString, TimeToString, DateToString, stringToDateTime, stringToDate, stringToTime
getYear, getMonth, getDay, getHour, getMinute, getSecond

td.style: height: 19px; text-align: center; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); background-color: rgb(84, 179, 243);

tr.td: KSQL

td.style: text-align: center; height: 19px; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); background-color: rgb(108, 192, 63);

tr.td: SQL（MySQL）
字符串连接

td.label:
SELECT c, c.fCompanyName, 
	CONCAT(c.fCity, ' - ', fContactName) AS fContact, 
	c.fPhone, c.fCity, c.fContactName 
FROM DEMO_Customers c

SELECT c.fCustomerID, c.fCompanyName, 
	CONCAT(c.fCity, ' - ', fContactName) AS fContact, 
	c.fPhone, c.fCity, c.fContactName 
FROM DEMO_Customers c

td.style: height: 19px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255); border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;

tr.td: KSQL中不支持“+”“||”等字符串连接操作符，只支持SQL-92的CONCAT函数

td.style: height: 19px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;

tr.td: 字符串截取

td.style: height: 19px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;
td.label:
SELECT c, c.fCompanyName, c.fContactName, c.fPhone, 
	SUBSTRING(c.fPhone, 1, INSTR(c.fPhone, ')')) AS fAreaCode, 
	SUBSTRING(c.fPhone, INSTR(c.fPhone, ')') + 1) AS fPhoneNumber 
FROM DEMO_Customers c

td.style: height: 19px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;
td.label:
SELECT c.fCustomerID, c.fCompanyName, c.fContactName, c.fPhone, 
	SUBSTRING(c.fPhone, 1, INSTR(c.fPhone, ')')) AS fAreaCode, 
	SUBSTRING(c.fPhone, INSTR(c.fPhone, ')') + 1) AS fPhoneNumber 
FROM DEMO_Customers c

tr.td: 字符串替换

td.style: height: 19px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;
td.label: SELECT c, c.fCompanyName, c.fContactName, c.fPhone, \n\tREPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(c.fPhone, '(', ''), ')', '-'), ' ', '') AS fPhoneNumber \nFROM DEMO_Customers c

td.style: height: 19px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;
td.label: SELECT c.fCustomerID, c.fCompanyName, c.fContactName, c.fPhone, \n\tREPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(c.fPhone, '(', ''), ')', '-'), ' ', '') AS fPhoneNumber \nFROM DEMO_Customers c

tr.td: 替换NULL值

td.label: SELECT c, c.fCompanyName, c.fFax, COALESCE(c.fFax, '无') AS fFaxNumber \nFROM DEMO_Customers c
SELECT c.fCustomerID, c.fCompanyName, c.fFax, COALESCE(c.fFax, '无') AS fFaxNumber \nFROM DEMO_Customers c

td.style: height: 19px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255); border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;

tr.td: KSQL中不支持“ISNULL”函数，只支持SQL-92的COALESCE函数

td.style: height: 19px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;

tr.td: 日期时间

td.label:
SELECT o, o.fOrderNumber, o.fOrderDate, 
	GetYear(o.fOrderDate) AS fYear, 
	GetMonth(o.fOrderDate) AS fMonth, 
	GetDay(o.fOrderDate) AS fDay, 
	StringToDate('2013-12-12') AS fDate 
FROM DEMO_Orders o

SELECT o.fOrderID, o.fOrderNumber, o.fOrderDate, 
	YEAR(o.fOrderDate) AS fYear, 
	MONTH(o.fOrderDate) AS fMonth, 
	DAY(o.fOrderDate) AS fDay, 
	STR_TO_DATE('2013-12-12', '%Y-%d-%m') AS fDate 
FROM DEMO_Orders o

td.style: height: 19px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;
height: 19px; color: rgb(0, 128, 0); border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;

tr.td: 不同类型的数据库中日期相关的函数差异很大

td.style: height: 19px; text-align: center; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

tr.td: 本地函数

td.label:
SELECT o, o.fOrderNumber, o.fOrderDate, 
	SQL.YEAR(o.fOrderDate) AS fYear, 
	SQL.MONTH(o.fOrderDate) AS fMonth, 
	SQL.DAY(o.fOrderDate) AS fDay, 
	SQL.STR_TO_DATE('2013-12-12', '%Y-%d-%m') AS fDate 
FROM DEMO_Orders o

td.style: height: 19px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255); border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;

tr.td: KSQL中可以用“SQL.”开头的方式直接调用数据库本地函数，这时会损失跨数据库平台能力

td.style: height: 19px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;

tr.td: KSQL中支持内嵌表达式函数（即BIZ模型中的fn），或者说KSQL中可以内嵌Java函数
注意：表达式函数是在SQL执行前运行的，执行后的结果以SQL参数的形式传入到SQL中，所以对于SQL执行过程来说，表达式函数只是一个常量
表达式函数的函数名是大小写敏感的
表达式函数一般用于为KSQL中提供上下文变量，例如：当前人、当前时间等

td.style: text-align: center; height: 19px; font-weight: bold; background-color: rgb(84, 179, 243); color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

tr.td: KSQL函数

td.style: text-align: center; height: 19px; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); background-color: rgb(108, 192, 63);

tr.td: 表达式函数
GUID

td.label: SELECT DISTINCT c.fRegion, GUID() AS fGuid \nFROM DEMO_Customers c \nWHERE c.fRegion IS NOT NULL
SELECT DISTINCT c.fRegion, :guid() AS fGuid \nFROM DEMO_Customers c \nWHERE c.fRegion IS NOT NULL

td.style: height: 19px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255); border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;

tr.td: KSQL函数的GUID会为每一行数据产生不同的GUID值

td.style: height: 19px; color: rgb(0, 128, 0); border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;

tr.td: 表达式函数的GUID在SQL执行前只运行一次，所以每行的GUID值是相同的
混合使用

td.label: SELECT o, o.fOrderDate, o.fOrderNumber \nFROM DEMO_Orders o \nWHERE getMonth(fOrderDate) = getMonth(:currentDate())

td.style: height: 19px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255); border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;

tr.td: 上面的语句获取历年同期（同月）的订单数据，其中的getMonth是KSQL函数，getCurrentDate是表达式函数；在KSQL函数中可以嵌套表达式函数，反过来则显然是不可以的

td.style: text-align: center; height: 19px; font-weight: bold; background-color: rgb(84, 179, 243); color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

tr.td: KSQL函数

td.style: text-align: center; height: 19px; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); background-color: rgb(108, 192, 63);

tr.td: 表达式函数
X5 API调用
X5中为KSQL和SQL调用提供了封装好的API

td.label: KSQL.select(String ksql, Map<String, Object> params, String dataModel, String fnModel)
SQL.select(Map<String, String> sql, List<Object> params, String dataModel)
KSQL.executeUpdate(String ksql, Map<String, Object> params, String dataModel, String fnModel)
SQL.executeUpdate(Map<String, String> sql, List<Object> params, String dataModel)

tr.td: ksql: KSQL语句
sql: 支持多数据库SQL语句，映射的key是数据库类型，映射的值是对应数据库的sql
params: 为KSQL中的命名参数赋值，可以为null（KSQL中的命名参数以冒号“:”开头）
（如果不关心数据库类型，key值可以使用SQL.DEFAULT_DB_NAME，表示缺省数据库SQL）
dataModel: 为KSQL提供数据模块，该数据模块必须包含KSQL中的概念和映射定义
params: 为SQL中的参数赋值，SQL中的参数是以?表示的顺序参数（同JDBC）
fnModel: 为KSQL提供函数模块，用于支持KSQL中的表达式函数，可以为null
dataModel: 为SQL执行提供数据模块，该数据模块为SQL执行提供数据源配置
代码示例：/BIZ/demo/db/logic/code/dsrc/KsqlAndSql.java中的getOrderIDByNumber_KSQL
代码示例：/BIZ/demo/db/logic/code/dsrc/KsqlAndSql.java中的getOrderIDByNumber_SQL

td.style: height: 8px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;
height: 8px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;
height: 19px; text-align: center; font-weight: bold; border-top-width: 1px; border-top-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-top-style: solid;

tr.td: 分布式事务处理

td.style: height: 19px; font-weight: bold; border-top-width: 1px; border-top-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-top-style: solid;

tr.td: X5为业务请求提供了分布式事务处理，并且对于开发人员来说是透明的
一次业务请求对应客户端对服务端的一次服务调用，一次业务请求中可以包含一个动作或多个动作（参照调用动作示例中批请求）
每个业务请求的上下文中包含一个事务对象（可以通过ContextHelper.getTransaction()获得），用于管理当前请求中所有的数据连接及事务
X5采用智能的事务启动机制，在业务动作中执行KSQL.executeUpdate或SQL.executeUpdate时会自动开启事务
在业务请求结束前，如果所有动作正常执行，则当前业务请求中所有开启事务的数据库连接会全部自动提交
在业务请求执行过程中，如果有异常被抛出，则当前业务请求中所有开启事务的数据库连接会全部自动回滚
在业务请求结束时，业务请求中所有的数据库连接会全部自动关闭
因此，开发人员不需要关心数据库连接及事务，如果需要数据回滚，只要抛出异常即可，异常信息会提示到客户端页面

td.style: height: 8px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;
height: 8px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;
height: 19px; text-align: center; font-weight: bold; border-top-width: 1px; border-top-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-top-style: solid;

tr.td: JDBC

td.style: height: 19px; font-weight: bold; border-top-width: 1px; border-top-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-top-style: solid;

tr.td: 开发人员可以从上下文的事务对象中获得JDBC的Connection对象，通过JDBC的API直接进行数据库操作
ModelUtils.getConnection
从当前上下文事务对象中获取数据库连接，不自动开启事务（因为同一个业务请求中数据库连接是共享的，所以这时获得的数据库连接可能已经开启事务了）
推荐用于不需要开启事务的SQL查询操作
ModelUtils.getConnectionInTransaction
从当前上下文事务对象中获取数据库连接，并且自动开启事务
推荐用于需要开启事务的SQL更新操作
由于这里获得的连接是从当前上下文的事务对象中获取的，因此开发人员同样不需要关心事务的提交和回滚，也不需要关心连接的关闭
代码示例：/BIZ/demo/db/logic/code/dsrc/KsqlAndSql.java中的doDatabaseProcedure

td.style: height: 8px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;
height: 8px; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-bottom-style: solid;
height: 19px; text-align: center; font-weight: bold; border-top-width: 1px; border-top-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-top-style: solid;

tr.td: 自定义事务

td.style: height: 19px; font-weight: bold; border-top-width: 1px; border-top-color: rgb(150, 150, 150); border-top-style: solid;

tr.td: 如果有特殊需求，需要独立的事务处理，或者需要通过代码手动控制事务，可以创建独立的事务对象
Transaction tran = new Transaction();
代码示例：/BIZ/demo/db/logic/code/dsrc/KsqlAndSql.java中的customTransaction
